snippet: Life for Krystine Dykes, 25, has been a progression from neglect and abuse to foster care and depression, and last year she became the foster guardian of her younger brothers.
abstract: Children’s Aid Society, one of the agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, gives Krystine Dykes of the Bronx gift cards to buy groceries for herself and her two disabled brothers.
lead_paragraph: Life for Krystine Dykes, 25, has been a progression from neglect and abuse to foster care and depression, and last year she became the foster guardian of her younger brothers.

headline.main: After Family Turmoil, a Commitment to Her Two Siblings
headline.print_headline: After Family Turmoil, a Commitment to Her Two Siblings
